title: 新人求助：天空中有彩虹、地球、太阳等天体的是什么mod的材质
author: 祈月ちゃん

replies.author: 祈月ちゃん
replies.txt_content:
友 发表于 2020-2-23 17:31
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/gog-skybox
感谢大佬帮助！

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
replies.txt_content:
这个是植物魔法Botania附属水晶花园Garden of Glass的特效天空，没有安装水晶花园也可以在配置文件打开
botania.cfg中
    # Set this to false to disable the fancy skybox in Garden of Glass.
    B:fancySkybox.enable=true
    安装水晶花园后打开特效，true为开，false未关
    # Set this to true to enable the fancy skybox in non Garden of Glass worlds. (Does not require Garden of Glass loaded to use, needs 'fancySkybox.enable' to be true as well)
    B:fancySkybox.normalWorlds=false
    未安装水晶花园后是否打开特效，如果设置ture则fancySkybox.enable为true

replies.author: 34retrt5
replies.txt_content: 染料工艺附属水晶花园
